docs.abstract: Carmelo Anthony hosts event at Challengers Boys & Girls Club in Los Angeles for young people, local leaders, police officers and professional basketball players to discuss police shootings and killings of police officers; separately, Michael Jordan releases statement announcing donations to NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund and the Institute for Community-Police Relations.
